name: test-function
description: Base for a node API Gateway lambda using CircleCI for CI/CD

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.function:create: npm run zip && npm i --save-dev aws-sdk && node ./scripts/create-function.js
scripts.function:update:dev: npm run zip && npm i --save-dev aws-sdk && node ./scripts/update-function-dev.js
scripts.function:update:stage: npm run zip && npm i --save-dev aws-sdk && node ./scripts/update-function-stage.js
scripts.zip: npm run clean && npm i --production && zip test-function.zip *.js package.json node_modules

author: Taylor Boren
